author: mperham
msg: Update getUsername to use 'p4 info' instead of relying on the POM or system property.
Add special logic to tell when the unit tests are running so others can run the unit tests
even when they don't have Perforce installed.

author: henning
msg: Set up a maven 2 driven skeleton for the Velocity site build.

author: mturyn
msg: From: Rob Gagne for defect XAP-114

Contributing a fix for this issue in TreeTable.js; changed 40px to 24px.  This provides enough room for the scrollbar without the gap.  Tried on different systems with different scrollbar widths and seems to work properly.
